dct_title_s: Map to explain the history of the Assyrians, Babylonians, Medes, and Persians
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale notes: "Parsenga 25 to a degree", "Stades 30 to a parsenga", "Parsenga 22 to a degree", "Liegue of 3000 paces or 2500 toise".
Shows topography, drainage, islands, settlements, places of historical interest.
"Front title hist. of world vol 2." -- upper right margin.
